channel.title: documentation on Documentation for Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in documentation on Documentation for Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Tags
item.description: The Relearn theme supports one default taxonomy of Hugo: the tag feature. Configuration Just add tags to any page: +++ tags = ["tutorial", "theme"] title = "Theme tutorial" weight = 15 +++ Behavior The tags are displayed at the top of the page, in their insertion order. Each tag is a link to a Taxonomy page displaying all the articles with the given tag. List all the tags In the config.
